StaticWebCache - Class in org.tantalum.net
A cache of remote http contents backed by local flash memory storage
StaticWebCache(char, DataTypeHandler) - Constructor for class org.tantalum.net.StaticWebCache
Create a persistent flash memory cache which acts like a Hashtable Items not already in the cache will be requested from the web with HTTP GET when you request them by url.

Create a persistent flash memory cache, and provide your own class for creating the HttpGetter or HttpPoster that will be used to get cache-miss items from the web.
